description: first half, ff. 121. 270 x 192; 195 x 145 mm. 22 lin. 14th cen. (last fol. by a later hand). Criticism of al-Bayhaqī's al-Sunan al-kubrá: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 447 (4: no. 1); S I, 618; the title does not appear in the ms. Incip.: ...قال ... الحمد لله ... اما بعد فهذه فواىد علقتها على السنن ... اکثرها اعتراضات علىه
author: Ibn al-Turkmānī, ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān, d. 1349
title: al-Jawhar al-naqī fī al-radd ʻalá al-Bayhaqī.
creator: Ibn al-Turkmānī, ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān, d. 1349
subject: Bayhaqī, Aḥmad ibn al-ḥusayn, 994-1066—Sunan al-kubrá.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
